links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)
The Return of the King (1980 film)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==April==
* '''[[14 April|14]]''' - [[Philip Stone]], who would voice [[Théoden]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]], is born.
==May==
* '''[[2 May|2]]''' - [[Theodore Bikel]], who would voice [[Aragorn]] in [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'' (1980 film)]], is born.
* '''?''' - Actor [[William Johnson]] is born.

==July==
* '''[[3 July|3]]''' - Artist [[Kay Woollard]] is born.
* '''[[16 July|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is appointed Professor of English Language at the University of Leeds.
* '''[[19 July|19]]''' - Director [[Arthur Rankin Jr.]] is born.
* '''[[31 July|31]]''' - Actor [[Garard Green]] is born.
==August==
* '''[[8 August|8]]''' - [[Gene Deitch]], who would make a short 12 minute [[The Hobbit (1967 film)|adaptation]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', is born.
==September==
* '''[[7 September|7]]''' - Composer [[Leonard Rosenman]] is born.
==October==
* '''[[1 October|1]]''' - Tolkien begins his Professorship.
* '''[[14 October|14]]''' - Philologist [[Brian Miller]], student and friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is born.
* '''[[25 October|25]]''' - Actor [[Billy Barty]] is born.
==November==
* '''[[6 November|6]]''' - Translator [[William Auld]] is born.
* '''[[21 November|21]]''' - '''[[Christopher Tolkien]] is born in Leeds, England'''.

==December==
* '''[[23 December|23]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
==?==
* '''?''' - Tolkien's poems "[[An Evening in Tavrobel]]", "[[The Lonely Isle]]",  and "[[The Princess Ní]]" are published in ''[[Leeds University Verse 1914-24]]''.
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] tells his son [[John Tolkien|John]] the story "[[The Orgog]]" when he cannot sleep.

{{Years|1921|1922|1923|1924|1925|1926|1927|}}
